turns.text: Do you exercise uh during the day time --
turns.label: qr

turns.text: -- or go to gym or anything
Yeah I I used to go to gym um last summer but then I started school again so its um so I dont exercise as much as Id like
turns.label: ny

turns.text: But I I do enjoy um going to gym and working out or just like I do sit ups sometimes before I go to bed or when I wake up and I ride exercise bike lot So -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh Well I try to do it at night before I go to bed
turns.label: b

turns.text: Um its really weird because Ill get down on the floor and Ill holler and tell my cat Nikki Ill say Nikki Im going to do my exercises now And she can be upstairs in the bedroom and I dont know She knows what Im talking about You know pretty soon here she comes So I lay out there in the living room floor and do my exercises you know
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Uh I had problem with my back so when I went to physical therapy --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- they gave me some exercises for my back
So I just try to keep that up because it seems like if I dont then then my back gives me problem again
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So I try to do it every night and uh -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah it seems like its you know - I can tell when I do it and when I dont do it --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: -- you know so you know its got to be good for you
But um long time ago I belonged to gym --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- but uh now I notice that this in this small city that I live in they do have gym that just opened up here about month ago
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So I was kind of thinking about joining it but I havent even gone down there and talked to them yet
turns.label: sd

turns.text: But uh it does really make you feel good and I like to bicycle too
turns.label: sv

turns.text: So that gives you you know lots of exercise
turns.label: sv

turns.text: I enjoy that lot I um bike in the summer I belong to biking club here in Kenosha
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And um we go on like fifty to hundred miles every Sunday
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So I try to keep up in the winter with the exercise bike so I you know can be in shape
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah otherwise you wouldnt be able to go very far huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: No huh-uh No I go with my dad He exercises lot more than I do though
turns.label: nn

turns.text: Yeah well like I say I just do it at night you know and um -
turns.label: b

turns.text: Do you like you try try to get my stomach muscles toned up
turns.label: qy

turns.text: Oh yeah thats what I like to do
turns.label: ny

turns.text: You know because boy they seem like they really get out of shape and once you get out of shape its hard to get back into shape --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- you know So Ive just been doing it I try to do it every night --
-- you know like I say you just Id rather do that than watch television anyhow --
So its just kind of nice and especially when I have my cat that comes down and joins me
turns.label: sd

turns.text: You know so Well I guess thats about all I can tell you about my exercising I wish I knew how to swim but I dont so I dont go swimming
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah um I dont swim much neither
turns.label: b

turns.text: uh-huh but they do say that swimming is really really good for you --
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- you know for every part of your body
So I wished I I wished I did know how to do that If they had pool here in Patterson Id probably you know put my bathing suit on and go down there but they dont have pool in this small city either
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So Well listen then its been nice talking to you
turns.label: fc
